summary.para: Describes the destination of a memory copy operation.

remarks.para: This structure is used by a number of helper methods, refer to Helper Structures and Functions for D3D12.

summary.para: A pointer to a memory block that receives the copied data.
The row pitch, or width, or physical size, in bytes, of the subresource data.
The slice pitch, or width, or physical size, in bytes, of the subresource data.
